note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Welcome to Retrode Utility.
Retrode Utility is a handy program that allows you to edit your Retrode's configuration file and install new firmware versions without having to mess around with strange text editors or the command line.

### Requirements
* Mac OS X 10.8
* A Retrode (preferably a Retrode 2, this software was not tested with the first Retrode)

To build from source:
* Xcode 4.3 or later

### Download
* [Retrode Utility 0.4.zip](https://github.com/downloads/cyco/Retrode-Utility/Retrode%20Utility%200.4.zip)
  * Fixed a bug that made 0.3 unusable
* [Retrode Utility 0.3.zip](https://github.com/downloads/cyco/Retrode-Utility/Retrode%20Utility%200.3.zip)
  * Retrode 1 support
  * Old (pre 0.17c) config files can be edited
  * dropping srm files on a window copies them to the retrode
* [Retrode Utility 0.2.zip](https://github.com/downloads/cyco/Retrode-Utility/Retrode%20Utility%200.2.zip)
  * App includes libusb for dfu-programmer
  * Retina compatibility
* [Retrode Utility 0.1.zip](https://github.com/downloads/cyco/Retrode-Utility/Retrode%20Utility%200.1.zip) - First release

### Thanks
Retrode Utility uses the great DFU-Programmer which is available over at Sourceforge ([here](http://dfu-programmer.sourceforge.net)). Also @jerrykrinock's code on [NSString geomentrics](https://github.com/jerrykrinock/CategoriesObjC/tree/master/NS(Attributed\)String+Geometrics) saved a lot of my time. Thanks to Matthias Hullin for making such a great device.

### Random Screenshots
![Splash Screen](https://raw.github.com/cyco/Retrode-Utility/master/Website%20Resources/screenshot_splash.png)

![Device Info](https://raw.github.com/cyco/Retrode-Utility/master/Website%20Resources/screenshot_info.png)

![Config](https://raw.github.com/cyco/Retrode-Utility/master/Website%20Resources/screenshot_config.png)
Config section will be redesigned some day.

![Release Notes](https://raw.github.com/cyco/Retrode-Utility/master/Website%20Resources/screenshot_releaseNotes.png)

![Firmware Installation](https://raw.github.com/cyco/Retrode-Utility/master/Website%20Resources/screenshot_installingFirmware.png)

### Disclaimer
Retrode is a registered trademark of Matthias Hullin with which this project is in no way affiliated.

### License
Retrode Utility is Open Source Software and will stay that way. Detailed license information will follow.
name: Retrode Utility
tagline: A Retrode configuration utility for Mac OS X
